name: GAME CHANGER
description:
This game was made in one week during the #BTPGameJam.  

THEME
The theme was "Game Development".  I wanted to create a game in which you fight by altering the games mechanics. This is the result.

MORE

This is the first game I have ever finished.
Well, I was not able to implement all features which I had in mind in the beginning but I finished it!
Feedback is appreciated. 
By the way... this was also the first game jam I took part in.

(Yes... there are a lot of bugs. Feel free to notify me if you find any.)
